Name: Sector
Notes on definition: Sectors, industries and subdivisions selected as relevant to legal work

children.Name: Agriculture
children.NACE name: Agriculture, Forestry and Fishing

children.Name: Natural resources
children.NACE name: Mining and Quarrying

children.Name: Mining
children.Notes on definition: Includes quarrying
children.NACE name: Mining of coal and lignite; Mining of metal ores; Other mining and quarrying; Mining support service activities

children.Name: Upstream oil and gas
children.Notes on definition: Covers only production, not distribution, processing or sale
children.NACE name: Extraction of crude petroleum and natural gas

children.Name: Manufacturing
children.Notes on definition: Covers only production, not design, distribution or sale. Only selected aspects widely seen in law firm taxonomies have been broken out as noslegal core elements. Other elements from NACE are contained in XP1.
children.NACE name: Manufacturing

children.Name: Food and drink
children.Notes on definition: Includes human and animal food manufacture and processing. Includes production of soft and alcoholic drinks.
children.NACE name: Manufacture of food products; manufacture of beverages

children.Name: Textiles
children.Notes on definition: Includes basic textiles, carpets, fashion, bags and footwear
children.NACE name: Manufacture of textiles; manufacture of wearing apparel

children.Name: Chemicals
children.Notes on definition: Includes petrochemicals and other chemicals. But excludes medicinal chemicals, which are included in pharmaceuticals
children.NACE name: Manufacture of coke and refined petrochemical products; Manufacture of chemicals and chemical products

children.Name: Pharmaceuticals
children.NACE name: Manufacture of basic pharmaceutical products and pharmaceutical preparations

children.Name: Electronics
children.Notes on definition: Includes chips and computers, excludes IoT products which fall into more traditional categories
children.NACE name: Manufacture of computer, electronic and optical products; Manufacture of electrical equipment

children.Name: Machinery
children.Notes on definition: Residual category for machinery not elsewhere classified. Includes agricultural and industrial machinery. But excludes computers and vehicles
children.NACE name: Manufacture of machinery and equipment n.e.c. (not elsewhere classified)

children.Name: Vehicles
children.Notes on definition: Includes cars, buses, trucks, trains, aircraft, watercraft and spacecraft. Includes both civil and military vehicles
children.NACE name: Manufacture of motor vehicles, trailers and semi-trailers; Manufacture of other transport equipment

children.Name: Automotive
children.Notes on definition: Includes cars, buses and trucks
children.NACE name: Manufacture of motor vehicles, trailers and semi-trailers

children.Name: Energy supply
children.Notes on definition: Includes supply of electricity, gas, steam and air conditioning
children.NACE name: Electricity, Gas, Steam and Air Conditioning Supply

children.Name: Electricity
children.Notes on definition: Electricity production, transmission, distribution and trading
children.NACE name: Electric power generation, transmission and distribution

children.Name: Renewable electricity
children.Notes on definition: Renewable electricity production
children.NACE name: Production of electricity from renewable sources

children.Name: Gas
children.Notes on definition: Includes synthetic gas production, and distribution and trading of natural and synthetic gas via mains. Excludes (1) production of natural gas (see Upstream oil and gas) (2) manufacture of petrochemicals (see Chemicals) (3) distribution and trading other than via mains (see Trade) (4) operation of gas pipelines (in Transport services).
children.NACE name: Manufacture of gas; distribution of gaseous fuels through mains

children.Name: Water
children.Notes on definition: Includes water management and supply, sewerage and waste management
children.NACE name: Water Supply; Sewerage, Waste Management and Remediation Activities

children.Name: Construction
children.NACE name: Construction

children.Name: Building
children.Notes on definition: Includes construction of residential and non-residential buildings
children.NACE name: Construction of residential and non-residential buildings

children.Name: Infrastructure
children.Notes on definition: Includes construction of transport and utility infrastructure
children.NACE name: Civil engineering

children.Name: Trade
children.NACE name: Wholesale and Retail Trade; Repair of Motor Vehicles and Motorcycles

children.Name: Wholesale
children.NACE name: Wholesale trade

children.Name: Retail
children.NACE name: Retail trade

children.Name: Transport services
children.Notes on definition: Includes human transportation, freight and logistics, transport via pipeline, storage, postal and courier services
children.NACE name: Transportation and Storage

children.Name: Rail
children.Notes on definition: Includes passenger and freight transport by train. Includes rail-based urban mobility such as underground and tram services
children.NACE name: Passenger rail transport; freight rail transport

children.Name: Road transport
children.Notes on definition: Includes bus, taxi, ride-share and road freight services
children.NACE name: Other passenger land transport; freight transport by road and removal services

children.Name: Water transport
children.Notes on definition: Includes sea, lake and river services for passengers and freight
children.NACE name: Water transport

children.Name: Aviation
children.Notes on definition: Includes air passenger and freight services
children.NACE name: Air transport

children.Name: Space transport
children.Notes on definition: Includes satellite-related services
children.NACE name: Space transport

children.Name: Hospitality services
children.Notes on definition: Includes hotels and other accommodation services. Also includes on-premises drink services (e.g. bars) and food delivery services. The term 'Hospitality services' is offered for succinctness, to avoid a cumbersome term such as 'Accommodation, and food and beverage services.' Some law firms use older terminology such as 'hotels and restaurants' so this is offered as an alternative term.
children.NACE name: Accommodation and Food Service Activities

children.Name: Information services
children.NACE name: Publishing, Broadcasting and Content Production and Distribution Activities; Telecommunications, Computer Programming, Consulting, Computing Infrastructure and Other Information Service Activities

children.Name: Software and data
children.Notes on definition: Includes all types of software development and distribution, except those within Video games or Content industry.  Includes data processing, infrastructure as a service and computer programming consulting services. Also includes information services (e.g. database access) other than those within Content.
children.NACE name: Other software publishing; computer programming, consultancy and related activities; computing infrastructure, data processing, hosting and other information service activities

children.Name: Content industry
children.Notes on definition: Includes production and publishing of books, film, TV, music and radio. Also includes literary, visual, musical, performing, other art forms, museums and other cultural activities.
children.NACE name: Publishing of books, newspapers and other publishing activities, except software publishing; motion picture, video and television programme production, sound recording and music publishing activities; programming, broadcasting, news agency and other content distribution activities; arts creation and performing arts activities; libraries, archives, museums and other cultural activities

children.Name: Computer games
children.Notes on definition: Separated out from other software (lse-inf-1) and content (lse-inf-2) given its economic significance, and specialisation in it by some lawyers. Excludes gambling games (lse-icr-5)
children.NACE name: Publishing of video games

children.Name: Films, TV and video
children.Notes on definition: Any form of recorded or broadcast moving images, excluding in relation to sports
children.NACE name: Motion picture, video and television programme activities

children.Name: Music and audio
children.Notes on definition: Any form of recorded or broadcast sound without images, excluding in relation to sports
children.NACE name: Sound recording and music publishing activities

children.Name: Arts and culture
children.Notes on definition: Other art and cultural activities not otherwise covered. Includes painting, sculpture, live music, theatre, opera, ballet, museums and digital versions of these.
children.NACE name: Arts creation and performing arts activities; libraries, archives, museums and other cultural activities

children.Name: Telecoms
children.Notes on definition: Includes wired and mobile services, whether terrestrial or satellite. Also includes telecom services reselling.
children.NACE name: Telecommunications

children.Name: Sports
children.Notes on definition: Includes operating sports and fitness facilities, clubs and events. A departure from NACE is that this noslegal definition includes broadcasts or recordings relating to sports
children.NACE name: Sports activities

children.Name: Gambling
children.Notes on definition: Includes casinos, betting shops, online games and other forms of gambling or betting.
children.NACE name: Gambling and betting

children.Name: Financial services
children.Notes on definition: Only selected elements are broken down in this core sectoral taxonomy. Further breakdowns are contained in XP1.
children.NACE name: Financial and Insurance Activities

children.Name: Insurance
children.Notes on definition: All types of insurance, including related activities such as insurance broking and loss adjustment
children.NACE name: Insurance, reinsurance and related activities, excluding compulsory social security

children.Name: Pension funds
children.Notes on definition: Pension funds and their management
children.NACE name: Pension funding

children.Name: Investment funds
children.Notes on definition: Funds and their management, other than pension funds
children.NACE name: Activities of trusts, funds and similar financial entities

children.Name: Banking
children.Notes on definition: Includes deposit-taking and credit-granting, including by people and organisations which are not strictly banks.
children.NACE name: Other monetary intermediation; Other financial service activities, except insurance and pension funding

children.Name: Financial markets
children.Notes on definition: Includes capital markets, commodity markets, money markets, foreign exchange markets and derivatives markets
children.NACE name: Activities auxiliary to financial services and insurance activities

children.Name: Private wealth
children.Notes on definition: Includes private trusts, family offices, private banking and investment advice to individuals
children.NACE name: Activities auxiliary to financial services and insurance activities

children.Name: Real estate
children.Notes on definition: Includes buying and leasing real estate, but not (1) accommodation services - lse-afs or (2) construction - lse-csn
children.NACE name: Real Estate Activities

children.Name: Commercial property
children.Notes on definition: Industrial, commercial, retail and other non-residential buildings and sites, including sites used for mining, drilling or other extractive purposes.

children.Name: Residential property
children.Notes on definition: Includes investing and business operation of residential property as well as individuals buying and leasing property for their own occupation

children.Name: Rural land
children.Notes on definition: Real estate valued primarily for its agricultural, forestry, recreational or environmental characteristics rather than for buildings or extractive uses.

children.Name: Education
children.NACE name: Education

children.Name: Care
children.NACE name: Human Health and Social Work Activities

children.Name: Healthcare
children.Notes on definition: Includes doctors, hospital, nursing, psychiatry, physiotherapy and other medical or health services
children.NACE name: Human health activities

children.Name: Social care
children.Notes on definition: Includes residential and non-residential social care. Excludes healthcare.
children.NACE name: Residential care activities; social work activities without accommodation

children.Name: Other services
children.Notes on definition: Professional, business and other services not classified elsewhere
children.NACE name: Professional, Scientific and Technical activities; Administrative and Support Service Activities; Other Service Activities
